comments:
0. This appears to work properly under Windows, and exhibit these symptoms under
Linux.

1. Open a workspace with no launch configurations in it
2. Open the "run..." or "debug..." window, in CDT or JDT
3. Note that the "Run" or "Debug" button is active, though no launch
configurations are selected.
4. Press "Run" or "Debug" button
5. See NullPointerException in the log, as shown below:

Error Jun 17, 2005 16:02:34.488 java.lang.NullPointerException
